backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with data models, in‑memory maps, access control setup, admin bootstrap, and a mock folder‑listing API.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration module that maps an OldActor state to the updated NewActor state by passing through fields unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report placeholder with no recorded features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of key frontend files including pages, components, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes with global resets.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point including favicon links and mounting root for the frontend app.
frontend/REPO_FOLDER_TREE.md: Auto‑generated document stub for the repository folder tree with instructions for regeneration.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the TanStack Router, app routes, providers, and the application shell wrapper.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen showing an access‑denied message with optional principal ID panel and a navigation button.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button wired to Internet Identity with loading state and session clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/PrincipalId: Displays the user’s principal ID with copy‑to‑clipboard functionality and status feedback.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Displays a dialog for new authenticated users to enter and save their name using profile hooks.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Protects routes by requiring admin role, showing loading skeletons or an access denied screen.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Blocks access for unauthenticated users and prompts them to log in via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireCust: Restricts content to authenticated customers, showing skeletons or an access denied message if needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireGard: Allows access only for authenticated users with garden center memberships or admin privileges.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequirePlat: Ensures only platform admins can access certain pages, displaying principal ID if denied.
Provides the main page layout with header, footer, and outlet for routed content.
frontend/src/components/layout/FooterSoc: Renders social media and email links with icons for the site footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Displays footer with branding, quick links, contact info, and social links.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Renders the site header with navigation, role-based portal links, and responsive mobile menu.
Shows a badge with the cart item count when items are present.
frontend/src/components/store/ProductCar: Displays a product’s image, details, and stock status with fallback for broken images.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminProduct: Provides mutations for adding products, initializing seed data, and a placeholder for toggling product state with query invalidation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useGardenCenter: Fetches active products filtered by garden center ID using a fallback since the backend lacks a direct method.
Defines garden center types and provides mutations for managing team members, with several operations unimplemented on the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/usePlatformAdmi: Grants or revokes platform admin access using mutation hooks and updates caller role state.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useCallerRole.ts: Fetches the caller's role with fallback handling and exposes a helper to check admin status.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useCallerUserPro: Retrieves the caller’s user profile via a query hook.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useCallerUserRol: Checks if the caller is an admin by invoking isCallerAdmin on the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useSaveCallerUse: Saves the caller’s user profile and refreshes cached profile data.
frontend/src/hooks/nursery/useCreateGard: Creates a new garden center and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/nursery/useGardenCent: Gets products for a garden center using a fallback filter and includes mutations for adding, updating, and toggling products, with some actions unimplemented.
frontend/src/hooks/nursery/useMyGardenCe: Returns placeholder garden center data for the caller due to missing backend support.
frontend/src/hooks/nursery/useUpdateGard: Updates garden center info and invalidates relevant cached queries.
frontend/src/hooks/orders/useOrders.ts: Fetches user orders but returns an empty list until backend support is added.
Attempts to place an order but always errors because backend functionality is missing.
frontend/src/hooks/storefront/useCategor: Fetches all product categories from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/storefront/useFullCat: Retrieves the full category taxonomy including subcategories.
frontend/src/hooks/storefront/useProduct: Fetches a single product by ID using the backend actor.
Hooks that fetch active products, products by category, and perform client‑side product search using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and invalidates related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, handles login/logout, and restores identities via an AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, theming, and base layout styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminNurseriesP: Admin page for managing garden centers, including member actions and nursery removal with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPlatformAd: Admin interface to add or remove platform admin Principal IDs with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin interface for adding products, toggling product activity, and initializing seed data using category and product hooks.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays cart items with quantity controls, item removal, and a summary section.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Renders the product catalog with search, category filters, taxonomy-based grouping, and product listings.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Shows order summary, handles placing orders, and requires user authentication to complete checkout.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showing a hero section, feature cards, and category listing using fetched taxonomy.
frontend/src/pages/MyOrdersPage.tsx: Displays the user's order history with statuses, item details, totals, and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/pages/nursery/NurseryDashbo: Nursery dashboard for editing garden center details and managing nursery products, categories, and images.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows a confirmation message after checkout and optionally displays the order ID with navigation buttons.
frontend/src/pages/portals/CustomerPorta: Customer portal that redirects authenticated customers to the catalog or shows access errors.
frontend/src/pages/portals/NurseryPortal: Nursery portal that redirects existing members to the dashboard or allows new nursery registration.
frontend/src/pages/portals/TeamPortalPag: Team portal that verifies platform admin access, showing loading, error, or access-denied states accordingly.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Renders product details, image gallery, quantity selection, and add-to-cart logic with loading and not-found handling.
frontend/src/store/cart/CartProvider.tsx: React context provider managing cart state, persistence, and operations like add, update, remove, and clear.
frontend/src/store/cart/cartStorage.ts: LocalStorage helpers for loading, saving, and clearing cart data with versioning and bigint handling.
frontend/src/store/cart/types.ts: Type definitions for cart items, state, actions, and the cart context.
frontend/src/store/cart/useCart.ts: Custom hook for accessing the cart context with error handling if used outside provider.
frontend/src/utils/categoryTaxonomy.ts: Utility functions for flattening category taxonomies, retrieving descendants, leaves, and searching by ID.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
frontend/tools/FOLDER_LISTING_COMMAND.md: Documentation for using the folder-listing tool to print a deterministic folder tree.
frontend/tools/list-folders.config.json: Configuration for the folder-listing tool specifying ignored directories, recursion depth, and root folders.
frontend/tools/list-folders.mjs: CLI script that scans directories, filters ignored folders, and generates a deterministic folder tree or markdown output.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, goals, architectural notes, known issues, and feature metadata for the GreenPlantz application.
